name: Frantic Fortunes
description:
Play as a dodgy fortune teller who predicts their client's fortunes by stealthily scrolling their facebook feed under the table while pretending to read their palm lines at the same time!

Average playtime: ~5 minutes

Made on a train from Brisbane to Melbourne over 37 hours for Locomojam 2019 by @OrcunNisli,  @duckpizza_, @thePlundr and Tom Campbell

open sauce on github
